duties_responsibilities.duty: Propose new product improvements or features.
Support senior leadership, product managers, and others with ad-hoc and recurring reports on users and user behavior.
Develop and monitor important business metrics, including user growth, cohort retention, virtual currency modeling, marketing performance, and user funnels.
Perform research analysis to understand current performance, analyze trends, and contribute to project prioritization.
Design, build, and launch new data models in production.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Data Science, Computer Science, or related field (Master's preferred)
